long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Feel the strength and resilience of Captain America every time you open a new tab. This Brave New World extension brings a dynamic and inspiring live wallpaper showcasing the iconic hero in action, embodying freedom and courage. Ideal for Marvel fans, this extension combines bold visuals with essential features to make your browsing experience both heroic and practical.

üïí Clock & Date Display: Stay on time with a sleek clock and date view.
Step into the world of Marvel‚Äôs most fearless hero and bring the power of Captain America to your browser. This extension is more than a wallpaper; it's a tribute to bravery and justice, making it perfect for anyone who admires the indomitable spirit of the Brave New World.
